Primary Energy: Earth 3 (reshaping worked stone) Supporting Energy: None (touch, instantaneous/permanent) Range: Touch Duration: Instantaneous (permanent) Total Cost: 3 Energy per 5ft cube Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Earth Potential + Earth Mastery Effect: Reshape stone into any form (doors, pillars, crude weapon). Can create hinges and latches. Cannot make complex mechanisms. Changes are permanent. Saving Throw: None (object manipulation) Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 2ft cube, 2 = 5ft cube, 3 = 10ft cube, 4 = 20ft cube or create detailed carvings
